remarks.format: ## Remarks `XsdString`和`TypesWhenNeeded`设置用于生成的相同版本的服务之间的高性能序列化[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。The `XsdString` and `TypesWhenNeeded` settings are meant for high performance serialization between services built on the same version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 这两个值不支持 VT （版本容错序列化），因为它们有意省略 VT 用于跳过或添加可选字段和属性的类型信息。These two values do not support VTS (Version Tolerant Serialization) because they intentionally omit type information that VTS uses to skip or add optional fields and properties. 不应使用`XsdString`或`TypesWhenNeeded`键入格式序列化和反序列化类型运行的不同版本的计算机上时[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]而不序列化该类型的计算机。You should not use the `XsdString` or `TypesWhenNeeded` type formats when serializing and deserializing types on a computer running a different version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] than the computer on which the type was serialized. 序列化和反序列化在运行不同版本的计算机上[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]会导致跳过序列化的类型信息，从而使得反序列化程序无法跳过可选字段，如果它们不在特定的格式化程序类型的另一个版本中可能存在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。Serializing and deserializing on computers running different versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] causes the formatter to skip serialization of type information, thus making it impossible for the deserializer to skip optional fields if they are not present in certain types that may exist in the other version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 如果必须使用`XsdString`或`TypesWhenNeeded`在此类方案中，你必须提供一个版本的已更改的类型的自定义序列化[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]相互。If you must use `XsdString` or `TypesWhenNeeded` in such a scenario, you must provide custom serialization for types that have changed from one version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] to the other.
